headline: Valero Energy Corporation Elects Robert L. Reymond to Board of Directors
summary: SAN ANTONIO, September 19, 2025--Valero Energy Corporation (NYSE: VLO, "Valero") announced today that Robert L. Reymond has been elected as an independent director to Valero’s board of directors (the "Board") and has joined the Board’s Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee, effective immediately.
